definition: to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to lay (railroad tracks, carpet, pipeline)/to install (wiring, cable)/to construct (road, concrete slab)
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
to pave (with paving stones)/to lay a road/(fig.) to lay the groundwork (for sth)/to give a present to sb to ensure success
to spread out (material)/to pave (the way, a road etc)

sentences.english: We spread the map out on the table.
sentences.chinese: 我们把地图展开铺在桌子上。

sentences.english: Place on a prepared tray, brush the tops lightly with egg.
sentences.chinese: 放在铺好烤纸的烤盘上，刷上蛋液入预热烤箱。

sentences.english: They counterchanged the floor in the bedroom with several colours.
sentences.chinese: 他们把卧室的地板铺成交错的颜色。

sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam's surface and workshops at the site have collapsed .
sentences.chinese: 紫坪铺水坝的表面出现了裂纹，周围的工场也已坍塌。

sentences.english: Some of the farmers had quit farming and were cutting railroad ties so they could feed their families.
sentences.chinese: 有些农民放弃了耕作，靠砍伐铺铁路的枕木养家糊口。

sentences.english: He spread a net for my feet and turned me back.
sentences.chinese: 他铺下网罗，绊我的脚，使我转回。

sentences.english: As he went along, people spread their cloaks on the road.
sentences.chinese: 走的时候，众人把衣服铺在路上。

sentences.english: These sesame sweets came from a sweet shop in Beijing earlier this week.
sentences.chinese: 这几块芝麻糖是这周前两天在北京一家糖果铺买的。

sentences.english: Use under the new wooden floor.
They would have liked bare wooden floors throughout the house.
sentences.chinese: 他们本想在整个房间的木地板上都不铺地毯的。

sentences.english: If you love the way, I can for you to shop.
sentences.chinese: 如果爱情的路，我可以为你铺。

sentences.english: At last, future work and conclusion are given.
sentences.chinese: 最后对未来的工作入行了铺望。

sentences.english: She spread a table-cloth over the table.
Square, a strong trails floor emphasized this kind of feeling.
sentences.chinese: 广场一条强烈的步道铺地强调了这种感觉。

sentences.english: Even Grandin’s own hug machine is now gathering dust.
sentences.chinese: 甚至格兰丁自己的拥抱机也铺了一层灰。

definition: to spread out/to display/to lay out a vendor's stall
to spread out (material)/to pave (the way, a road etc)
pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
to build by laying bricks or stones
